content: **drops crochet scarf in a mussel lace patttern crochet with snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** approx 32 x 150 cm 12½ x 59 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 500 g col no 01 off white drops crochet hook size 8 mm / l or the hook needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge crochet gauge 2 5 repeats in the width = 20 cm / 8
